abort.description: Occurs when the loading of an audio/video is aborted

afterPrint.description: Occurs when a page has started printing, or if the print dialogue box has been closed

animationEnd.description: Occurs when a CSS animation has completed

animationIteration.description: Occurs when a CSS animation is repeated

animationStart.description: Occurs when a CSS animation has started

beforePrint.description: Occurs when a page is about to be printed

beforeUnload.description: Occurs before the document is about to be unloaded

blur.description: Occurs when an element loses focus

canPlay.description: Occurs when the browser can start playing the audio/video

canPlayThrough.description: Occurs when the browser can play through the audio/video without stopping for buffering

change.description: Occurs when the content of a form element, the selection, or the checked state have changed (for <input>, <select>, and <textarea>)

click.description: Occurs when the user clicks on an element

contextMenu.description: Occurs when the user right-clicks on an element to open a context menu

copy.description: Occurs when the user copies the content of an element

cut.description: Occurs when the user cuts the content of an element

dblClick.description: Occurs when the user double-clicks on an element

drag.description: Occurs when an element is being dragged

dragEnd.description: Occurs when the user has finished dragging an element

dragEnter.description: Occurs when the dragged element enters the drop target

dragLeave.description: Occurs when the dragged element leaves the drop target

dragOver.description: Occurs when the dragged element is over the drop target

dragStart.description: Occurs when the user starts to drag an element

drop.description: Occurs when the dragged element is dropped on the drop target

durationChange.description: Occurs when the duration of the audio/video is changed

ended.description: Occurs when the audio/video has ended

error.description: Occurs when an error occurs while loading an audio/video

focus.description: Occurs when an element gets focus

focusIn.description: Occurs when an element is about to get focus

focusOut.description: Occurs when an element is about to lose focus

fullscreenChange.description: Occurs when an element is displayed in fullscreen mode

fullscreenError.description: Occurs when an element can not be displayed in fullscreen mode

hashChange.description: Occurs when there has been changes to the anchor part of a URL

input.description: Occurs when an element gets user input

invalid.description: Occurs when an element is invalid

keyDown.description: Occurs when a user is pressing a key

keyPress.description: Occurs when a user presses a key

keyUp.description: Occurs when a user releases a key

load.description: Occurs when an object has loaded

loadedData.description: Occurs when media data is loaded

loadedMetadata.description: Occurs when meta data (like dimensions and duration) are loaded

loadStart.description: Occurs when the browser starts looking for the specified audio/video

message.description: Occurs when a message is received through the event source

mouseDown.description: Occurs when a mouse button is pressed down on an element

mouseEnter.description: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the selected element

mouseLeave.description: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the selected element

mouseMove.description: Occurs when the mouse pointer is moving while it is over an element

mouseOut.description: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves out of an element

mouseOver.description: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves over an element

mouseUp.description: Occurs when a mouse button is released over an element

mouseWheel.description: Deprecated. Use the wheel event instead

offline.description: Occurs when the browser starts to work offline

online.description: Occurs when the browser starts to work online

open.description: Occurs when a connection with the event source is opened

pageHide.description: Occurs when the user navigates away from a webpage

pageShow.description: Occurs when the user navigates to a webpage

paste.description: Occurs when the user pastes some content in an element

pause.description: Occurs when the audio/video has been paused

play.description: Occurs when the audio/video has been started or is no longer paused

playing.description: Occurs when the audio/video is playing after having been paused or stopped for buffering

popState.description: Occurs when the window's history changes

progress.description: Occurs when the browser is in the process of getting the media data (downloading the media)

rateChange.description: Occurs when the playing speed of the audio/video is changed

resize.description: Occurs when the document view is resized

reset.description: Occurs when a form is reset

scroll.description: Occurs when an element's scrollbar is being scrolled

search.description: Occurs when the user writes something in a search field (for <input="search">)

seeked.description: Occurs when the user is finished moving/skipping to a new position in the audio/video

seeking.description: Occurs when the user starts moving/skipping to a new position in the audio/video

select.description: Occurs after the user selects some text (for <input> and <textarea>)

show.description: Occurs when a <menu> element is shown as a context menu

stalled.description: Occurs when the browser is trying to get media data, but data is not available

storage.description: Occurs when a Web Storage area is updated

submit.description: Occurs when a form is submitted

suspend.description: Occurs when the browser is intentionally not getting media data

timeUpdate.description: Occurs when the playing position has changed (like when the user fast forwards to a different point in the media)

toggle.description: Occurs when the user opens or closes the <details> element

touchCancel.description: Occurs when the touch is interrupted

touchEnd.description: Occurs when a finger is removed from a touch screen

touchMove.description: Occurs when a finger is dragged across the screen

touchStart.description: Occurs when a finger is placed on a touch screen

transitionEnd.description: Occurs when a CSS transition has completed

unload.description: Occurs once a page has unloaded (or the browser window has been closed)

volumeChange.description: Occurs when the volume of the audio/video has changed

waiting.description: Occurs when the video stops because it needs to buffer the next frame

wheel.description: Occurs when the mouse wheel rolls up or down over an element
